targets.rawSql:
set search_path to explore,public;

SELECT time, hll_cardinality(hll_union_agg(hll_gbifid))
FROM explore.cube
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
AND grouping_scientificname = 1
--AND scientificname % '$scientificname' --OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$scientificname')), '') IS null)
AND grouping_locality = 1
AND grouping_recordedby = 1
AND grouping_centro_id = 0
AND grouping_time = 0
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 WHERE NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$scientificname')), '') IS NULL)
AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), centro_id)
GROUP BY 1

set search_path to explore,public;

SELECT time, hll_cardinality(hll_union_agg(hll_gbifid)) 
FROM explore.cube
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
AND grouping_scientificname = 0 -- CASE WHEN NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($scientificname)), '') is null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
AND scientificname % '$scientificname' --) --OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($scientificname)), '') IS null) 
AND grouping_locality = 1 --CASE WHEN NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($locality)), '') IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
--AND ("locality" IN ($locality) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($locality)), '') IS NULL)
AND grouping_cluster_id = 1
AND grouping_recordedby = 1
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 WHERE NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$scientificname')), '') IS NOT NULL)
AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), centro_id)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

set search_path to explore,public;

with a as (
SELECT 
centro_id, 
hll_cardinality(hll_union_agg(hll_gbifid)) AS tooltip
FROM explore.cube
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
AND grouping_scientificname = 1
AND grouping_locality = 1
AND grouping_recordedby = 1
AND grouping_centro_id = 0
AND grouping_time = 0
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 WHERE NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$scientificname')), '') IS NULL)
AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), centro_id)
group by 1
)
select 
ST_Y (ST_Transform (centro_id, 4326)) AS latitude,
ST_X (ST_Transform (centro_id, 4326)) AS longitude,
tooltip
from a

--GROUP BY 1,2

WITH a AS (
SELECT
geom,
COUNT(*) OVER() AS cnt
FROM explore.gbif
LEFT JOIN explore.recordedby ON gbif.recordedby_id = recordedby.id 
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventdate)
AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), geom)
AND (tsv @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$search') OR NULLIF('$search', '') IS null)
AND (recordedby.name % '$recordedby' OR NULLIF('$recordedby', '') IS null)
--AND (preparations IN ($preparations) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($preparations)), '') IS null)
), b AS (
SELECT
geom,
ST_ClusterKMeans(geom, LEAST(cnt::integer, 100)) OVER() AS clusters
FROM a
)
SELECT
clusters,
COUNT(clusters) AS tooltip,
AVG(ST_Y (ST_Transform (geom, 4326))) AS latitude,
AVG(ST_X (ST_Transform (geom, 4326))) AS longitude
FROM b
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

--set search_path to explore,public;

SELECT hll_cardinality(hll_union_agg(hll_gbifid)) 
--hll_cardinality(hll_union_agg(hll_gbifid)),
--SUM(hll_cardinality(hll_gbifid))
FROM explore.cube
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
AND grouping_scientificname = 1 --CASE WHEN NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($scientificname)), '') is null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
--AND (scientificname % '$scientificname' OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$scientificname')), '') IS null)
AND grouping_locality = 1 --CASE WHEN NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($locality)), '') is null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
AND grouping_recordedby = 1
AND grouping_centro_id = 0
AND grouping_time = 0
AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), centro_id)
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 WHERE NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$scientificname')), '') IS NULL)

hll_cardinality(hll_union_agg(hll_gbifid))

AND (scientificname % '$scientificname')
AND grouping_locality = 1 --CASE WHEN NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($locality)), '') is null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

panels.title: Total records without geom and time

targets.rawSql:
--set search_path to explore,public;

SELECT hll_cardinality(hll_union_agg(hll_cluster_id)) 
--hll_cardinality(hll_union_agg(hll_gbifid)),
--SUM(hll_cardinality(hll_gbifid))
FROM explore.cube
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
AND grouping_scientificname = 1 --CASE WHEN NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($scientificname)), '') is null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
--AND (scientificname % '$scientificname' OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$scientificname')), '') IS null)
AND grouping_locality = 1 --CASE WHEN NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($locality)), '') is null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
AND grouping_recordedby = 1
AND grouping_centro_id = 0
AND grouping_time = 0
AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), centro_id)
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 WHERE NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$scientificname')), '') IS NULL)

set search_path to explore,public;

SELECT 
hll_cardinality(hll_union_agg(hll_gbifid)) 
FROM explore.cube
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
AND grouping_scientificname = 0 --CASE WHEN NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($scientificname)), '') is null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
AND (scientificname % '$scientificname')
AND grouping_locality = 1 --CASE WHEN NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($locality)), '') is null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
AND grouping_recordedby = 1
AND grouping_cluster_id = 0
AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), centro_id)
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 WHERE NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$scientificname')), '') IS NOT NULL)

set search_path to explore,public;

SELECT recordedby,
hll_cardinality(hll_union_agg(hll_gbifid))
FROM explore.cube
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
AND grouping_scientificname = 1
--AND (scientificname % '$scientificname' OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$scientificname')), '') IS null)
AND grouping_locality = 1
AND grouping_recordedby = 0
AND grouping_centro_id = 0
AND grouping_time = 0
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 WHERE NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$scientificname')), '') IS NULL)
AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), centro_id)
GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT COUNT(*), recordedbY
FROM explore.gbif
LEFT JOIN explore.recordedby ON gbif.recordedby_id = recordedby.id 
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventdate)
AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), geom)
AND (tsv @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$search') OR NULLIF('$search', '') IS null)
AND (recordedby.name % '$recordedby' OR NULLIF('$recordedby', '') IS null)
AND (preparations IN ($preparations) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($preparations)), '') IS null)
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

set search_path to explore,public;

SELECT scientificname, 
hll_cardinality(hll_union_agg(hll_gbifid))
--SUM(hll_cardinality(hll_gbifid))
FROM explore.cube
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
AND grouping_scientificname = 0
--AND (scientificname % '$scientificname' OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$scientificname')), '') IS null)
AND grouping_locality = 1
AND grouping_recordedby = 1
AND grouping_centro_id = 0
AND grouping_time = 0
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 WHERE NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT('$scientificname')), '') IS NULL)
AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), centro_id)
GROUP BY 1 
ORDER BY 2 desc
LIMIT 10

SELECT COUNT(*), scientificname
FROM explore.gbif
LEFT JOIN explore.recordedby ON gbif.recordedby_id = recordedby.id
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventdate)
--AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), geom)
AND (tsv @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$search') OR NULLIF('$search', '') IS null)
AND (recordedby.name % '$recordedby' OR NULLIF('$recordedby', '') IS null)
--AND (scientificname % '$scientificname')
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT eventdate, COUNT(gbifid) OVER(), gbifid, catalognumber, scientificname, recordedby, occurrenceid, sex, preparations, locality
FROM explore.gbif
LEFT JOIN explore.recordedby ON gbif.recordedby_id = recordedby.id 
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventdate)
AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), geom)
AND (tsv @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$search') OR NULLIF('$search', '') IS null)
--AND (recordedby.name % '$recordedby' OR NULLIF('$recordedby', '') IS null)
--AND (preparations IN ($preparations) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($preparations)), '') IS null)
ORDER BY eventdate DESC
LIMIT 100

title: Explore a GBIF dataset hll topn
